Trade/Device Name(s): FaStep Early Pregnancy Rapid Test Strip
FaStep Early Pregnancy Rapid Test Cassette
FaStep Early Pregnancy Rapid Test Midstream
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FaStep Early Pregnancy Rapid Test in strip, cassette, and midstream formats for qualitative detection of HCG in human urine to aid early pregnancy detection
Indications for Use Summary: For qualitative detection of Human Chorionic Gonadotropin (HCG) in human urine as an aid in early detection of pregnancy, for over-the-counter use, in some cases as early as six days before the missed period
